trans-unit.source: PyLZMA provides a platform independent way to read and write data that has been compressed or can be decompressed by the LZMA library by Igor Pavlov.
trans-unit.target: PyLZMA provides a platform independent way to read and write data that has been compressed or can be decompressed by the LZMA library by Igor Pavlov.

trans-unit.source: Python bindings for the LZMA library by Igor Pavlov.
trans-unit.target: Python bindings for the LZMA library by Igor Pavlov.
